messages: As a big-time consumer in @Bose, I can firmly say that @Bose beats @Sonos in the sound test, 10 times out of 10.  Bose is Boss. #Bose
RT @kramergirl: Yup! @BrunoMars just killed halftime show! #classic #classy #classact
The @Budweiser commercial you'll see w/ the world famous #BudweiserClydesdales 🐴 (lifetime favorites of mine) and a yellow lab pup is great.
